
public class Tutorial04 {
	
	//To iterate a part of code multiple times.


	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		
		//System.out.println("TechGiddion");

		//initialization 
		//condition
		//Statement
		//increment/decrement

        int i = 1;
//		while(i<=5) {
//			
//			System.out.println("TechGiddion");
//			
//			i++;
//			
//		}
		
		do {
			System.out.println("TechGiddion");
			i++;
			
		}while(i<=5);
		
			
			
			
		
		
		
	}

}
